title: Lost series because client is crashing
body: rito fix your shit clients I have seen and heard about multiple issues such as these with the legacy and alpha client. Sincerely a player who just lost promos to this shit

replies.body: yeah i just lost two ranked games because my client kept crashing. the first one i thought was just my computer lagging so i restarted it and cleaned it up a bit. Then started another game and i played for a total of 13 minutes then ms went to 500 and "attempting to reconnect" for the next 12
I had the same problem. Try the initiate repair button in the settings. It will reset your league client and look for corrupt files. It worked for me.

It sucks to hear a crash resulted in ending your series.  :(  I'd like to help troubleshoot whatever might be causing the crash, but I need more info.  I know you're frustrated, but we can figure this out and prevent further issues if you can toss me some more info.  What exactly is happening and what do you mean exactly by crash.  Let me know!
Lost rank match a day ago on the same 'bs'.
